C

clean() - Method in class player.AsynchronousPlayer
Cleans the buffer.
Client - Class in network
The client is used to connect to a remote server, to manage the communication between remote server and local client and to synchronize the remote and local game.
Client(Player) - Constructor for class network.Client
Initiates a client for the given player.
clone() - Method in class gameelements.GameSituation

List of commands that never use parameters.

The color of the tokens that are being placed into the field.
color - Variable in class player.Player
The color of tokens the player plays in this game.

The tag used to indicate the end of a commands parameter list.

COMMENT_TAG - Static variable in class network.Protocol
The tag used to indicate a comment, that should be ignored by the server.
comparatorAsc() - Static method in class ai.EvaluablePosition
Returns an ascending comparator for evaluable positions.
comparatorDesc() - Static method in class ai.EvaluablePosition
Returns a descending comparator for evaluable positions.
ComputerPlayer - Class in player
Represents the local computer player using the available strategy for generating moves.
ComputerPlayer(String, Game, GameColor) - Constructor for class player.ComputerPlayer
Initiates a computer player.
connectView(GamePanel) - Method in class gameelements.Game
Connects the view and the model by registering the views animator object as observer to the games game board.
ConsoleGame - Class in gameelements
Overrides the game class mainly for the purpose of suppressing the creation of any animations, which are not needed for console games.
ConsoleGame(GamePreferences) - Constructor for class gameelements.ConsoleGame
Initiates a console game according to the given preferences.
ConsolePlayer - Class in player
Represents a player that connects to the local server by utilizing a service that is acting as client and which is provided by the local server to manage the communication between local game and player.
ConsolePlayer(String, Game, GameColor) - Constructor for class player.ConsolePlayer
Initiates a console player.
createGame() - Method in class gui.MainFrame
Removes old game, creates new game model, corresponding view, connects them, and starts the game.
createPlayer(String, Game, GameColor, int) - Static method in class player.Player
Factory method for creating the correct player according to the given player type.
